nodes.text: The House Paramexor Squire Armorer Droid was a model of armorer droid owned by House Paramexor. It was not available for public sale. The droid was intended to repair and customize a bounty hunter's gear; report information on the weaponry its owner could find; and serve as sentry to the hunter's mobile headquarters. The Squire had an IMR Module (Installation, Maintenance and Repair Module) to perform its tasks.
